snippet: Boise State is poised to join the Big West for most of its nonfootball programs, said its president, Bob Kustra.
abstract: Georgia State football coach Bill Curry says he is retiring after this season; other college sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: Boise State is poised to join the Big West for most of its nonfootball programs, said its president, Bob Kustra.

headline.seo: Kustra Says Boise State Poised to Join Big West
headline.main: Kustra Says Boise State Poised to Join Big West
headline.print_headline: Curry to Retire at Georgia State
